Package com.ovoc01.app.core.mapping

Class DtbObjectAccess

java.lang.Object
com.ovoc01.app.core.mapping.DtbObjectAccess
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class DtbObjectAccess extends Object
Subclass of DtbObject with additional functionality to build a primary key.
